entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fisher Branch
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fisher Branch 11:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -21.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -26.6°C
Wind: WSW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
